title: Is We Dumb? | Meat Market. Chemtrails. Anxiety. Canary.
description:
Have you ever been having sex and thought to yourself, "Man... I wish I could use my balls as a dildo." Yep... now you can! Let's talk about that, going to jail for egging a cop car, the ugly side of LA culture and the reviews they leave online, high anxiety trying to open plastic grocery bags, and more on today's episode of IWD?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/xfhlzBA3em8
